casename: Abdul Munaf Bin Mohd Ismail (but charged as Kathar Abdul Gafoor) v Public Prosecutor
counsel: S Skandarajah and P Thirumurthy (Murthy and Co) for petitioner; David Chew (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for respondent
tags: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Revision of proceedings
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Revision of proceedings/Petitioner pleaded guilty to charge of entering Singapore without valid pass as an Indian national/Whether conviction and sentence could be set aside on the ground that petitioner could produce Malaysian passports and certificate of citizenship to show that he was a Malaysian citizen.
